TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ItemBoundsPortion extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies a portion of the list view item from which to retrieve the bounding rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the members of this enumeration when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control. This enumeration is also used when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ItemBoundsPortion Entire = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The bounding rectangle of the entire item, including the icon, the item text, and the subitem text (if displayed), should be retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ItemBoundsPortion Icon = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The bounding rectangle of the icon or small icon should be retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ItemBoundsPortion ItemOnly = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The bounding rectangle of the icon or small icon and the item text should be retrieved. In all views except the details view of the , this value specifies the same bounding rectangle as the value. In details view, this value specifies the bounding rectangle specified by the value without the subitems. If the property is set to , this property does not include the area of the check boxes in its bounding rectangle. To include the entire item, including the check boxes, use the value when calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ItemBoundsPortion Label = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The bounding rectangle of the item text should be retrieved.
